messages.title: A strong voice for Leicester West
messages.content: Supporting local businesses to help bring new long-term and well paid jobs for all. Improving your quality of life by creating a cleaner and safer environment. Effectively representing all of you and never taking your support for granted.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will work to bring long-term and well paid jobs to the City and reduce unemployment.
Ensure that people are better off in work than they would be on benefits.
Unlike Labour, will fight to secure a referendum on EU membership to allow your say.
Committed to control immigration and reduce the strains it puts on local services.
Seek to improve all of our local schools, colleges and universities.
Will work to deliver a fair tax system, taking the lowest paid out of tax completely.
Improving your quality of life by creating a cleaner and safer environment.

issues.brexitEurope: Will fight to secure a referendum on EU membership to allow your say.
issues.economy: Will work to bring long-term and well paid jobs to the City and reduce unemployment.
issues.education: Seek to improve all of our local schools, colleges and universities.
issues.environment: Improving your quality of life by creating a cleaner and safer environment.
issues.governance: Ensure that people are better off in work than they would be on benefits.
issues.immigration: Committed to control immigration and reduce the strains it puts on local services.
issues.socialWelfare: Ensure that people are better off in work than they would be on benefits.
